This Privacy Policy describes how Cryptick collects, uses, and protects your information when you use the application.

 1. Purpose of the App
Cryptick is a mobile application developed as a final project for the DAM (Development of Multiplatform Applications) degree. It is designed for educational and demonstration purposes only.

 2. Information We Collect
Cryptick may collect the following types of information:

 Personal Data (if applicable): such as your email or username if you sign in using Firebase Authentication.

 Usage Data: such as the date and time of your activity in the app.

 Device Information: such as device type or OS version (collected anonymously via Firebase).

 This information is used only to provide core app functionalities.

 3. How We Use Your Information
Any data collected is used solely for:

 • Enabling basic app features (e.g., authentication, user storage).

 • Improving the reliability and performance of the app.

 • Debugging or fixing issues during development.

 Your data is not sold, shared, or used for marketing purposes.

 4. Third-Party Services
Cryptick uses Firebase by Google for authentication and database services. Firebase may collect information as described in their privacy policy.

 5. Data Security
We are committed to keeping your data secure. While this is a student project and not a production app, all reasonable efforts are made to follow secure practices using Firebase services.

 6. Children's Privacy
Cryptick is not intended for children under the age of 13. No data is knowingly collected from children.

 7. Changes to This Policy
This Privacy Policy may be updated from time to time. If changes are made, they will be reflected in this document with an updated "last updated" date.

 8. Contact
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact: ciucaandreic@gmail.com
